description.value: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] or succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump], increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don't count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.
